page.title: 18LANGUAGE,ANNAN
page.content: In Annan we speak English,but we also have our own words and expressions which are familiar only to people living in and around Annan.Strangers to Annan would find them strange.Here are some examples:{ {Yin,twee,thrie,fower,five,six, seevin, {ight,nine ten.}This is how a local might count to ten. {Gan}means going {My bit}means my house {The top house}means the house at the top of the street. {'How's the fettle?'}means'How are you keeping?' {'Ah ken'}means'I know' and is commonly used in many areas of Scotland.
